languages.text:
Горящая поверхность, электричество, токсичные испарения и иные виды враждебного окружения могут нанести урон отряду или подвергнуть персонажей {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}продолжительным негативным эффектам{/g}.
Чтобы прекратить действие таких эффектов, используйте {g|ib:Medikit}медкомплект{/g}.

{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g} surfaces, electricity, toxic fumes, and other hazardous environmental effects can deal damage to your party or inflict ongoing {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative effects{/g}.
Use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to stop such effects.
languages.original_text:
Горящая поверхность, электричество, токсичные испарения и иные виды враждебного окружения могут нанести урон отряду или подвергнуть персонажей {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}продолжительным негативным эффектам{/g}.
Чтобы прекратить действие таких эффектов, используйте {g|ib:Medikit}медкомплект{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Burning surfaces, electricity, toxic fumes, and other hazardous environmental effects can deal damage to your party or inflict {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}ongoing negative effects{/g}.
Use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to stop such effects.

Burning surfaces, electricity, toxic fumes, and other hazardous environmental effects can deal damage to your party or inflict {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}ongoing negative effects{/g}.
Use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to stop such effects.

Burning surfaces, electricity, toxic fumes, and other hazardous environmental effects can deal damage to your party or inflict {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}ongoing negative effects{/g}.
Use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to stop such effects.

{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g} surfaces, electricity, toxic fumes, and other hazardous environmental effects can deal damage to your party or inflict ongoing {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative effects{/g}.
Use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to stop such effects.

{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g} surfaces, electricity, toxic fumes, and other hazardous environmental effects can deal damage to your party or inflict ongoing {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative effects{/g}.
Use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to stop such effects.

languages.text:
Las superficies {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}ardientes{/g}, la electricidad, los vapores tóxicos y otros peligros del entorno pueden infligir daño a tu grupo o infligir {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}efectos negativos{/g} continuos.
Usa un {g|ib:Medikit}botiquín{/g} para detener estos efectos.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g} surfaces, electricity, toxic fumes, and other hazardous environmental effects can deal damage to your party or inflict ongoing {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative effects{/g}.
Use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to stop such effects.

traits.locale_text:
Las superficies {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}ardientes{/g}, la electricidad, los vapores tóxicos y otros peligros del entorno pueden infligir daño a tu grupo o infligir {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}efectos negativos{/g} continuos.
Usa un {g|ib:Medikit}botiquín{/g} para detener estos efectos.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}灼熱{/g}の地表、電気、有毒ガス、その他の有害な環境効果は、部隊にダメージを与えたり、継続的な{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}マイナス効果{/g}を与えたりする。
その効果を止めるには{g|ib:Medikit}メディキット{/g}を使う。
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g} surfaces, electricity, toxic fumes, and other hazardous environmental effects can deal damage to your party or inflict ongoing {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative effects{/g}.
Use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to stop such effects.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}灼熱{/g}の地表、電気、有毒ガス、その他の危険な環境効果は、パーティーにダメージを与えたり、継続的な{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}悪影響{/g}を与えたりする。
その効果を止めるには{g|ib:Medikit}メディキット{/g}を使う。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}表面、电流、毒雾，以及其他危险的环境，会对您和您的同伴造成伤害，或带来持续性的{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}负面影响{/g}。
使用{g|ib:Medikit}医疗包{/g}可以阻止此类影响。
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g} surfaces, electricity, toxic fumes, and other hazardous environmental effects can deal damage to your party or inflict ongoing {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative effects{/g}.
Use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to stop such effects.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}表面、电流、毒雾，以及其他危险的环境，会对您和您的同伴造成伤害，或带来持续性的{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}负面影响{/g}。
使用{g|ib:Medikit}医疗包{/g}可以阻止此类影响。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Brennende{/g} Oberflächen, Elektrizität, giftige Dämpfe und andere gefährliche Umwelteffekte können deiner Gruppe Schaden zufügen oder anhaltende {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative Effekte{/g} bewirken.
Verwende ein {g|ib:Medikit}Medikit{/g}, um solche Effekte zu stoppen.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g} surfaces, electricity, toxic fumes, and other hazardous environmental effects can deal damage to your party or inflict ongoing {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative effects{/g}.
Use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to stop such effects.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Brennende{/g} Oberflächen, Elektrizität, giftige Dämpfe und andere gefährliche Umwelteffekte können deiner Gruppe Schaden zufügen oder anhaltende {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative Effekte{/g} bewirken.
Verwende ein {g|ib:Medikit}Medikit{/g}, um solche Effekte zu stoppen.

languages.text:
Les surfaces {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}brûlantes{/g}, l'électricité, les fumées toxiques et autres effets environnementaux dangereux peuvent infliger des dégâts à votre groupe ou des {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}effets négatifs{/g} continus.
Utilisez un {g|ib:Medikit}médikit{/g} pour mettre fin à ces effets.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g} surfaces, electricity, toxic fumes, and other hazardous environmental effects can deal damage to your party or inflict ongoing {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative effects{/g}.
Use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to stop such effects.

traits.locale_text:
Les surfaces {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}brûlantes{/g}, l'électricité, les fumées toxiques et autres effets environnementaux dangereux peuvent infliger des dégâts à votre groupe ou des {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}effets négatifs{/g} continus.
Utilisez un {g|ib:Medikit}médikit{/g} pour mettre fin à ces effets.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Yanan{/g} yüzeyler, elektrik, zehirli duman ve diğer tehlikeli çevresel etkiler; grubuna hasar verebilir veya süregiden {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}olumsuz etkilere{/g} sebep olabilir.
Böyle etkileri durdurmak için {g|ib:Medikit}sıhhiye çantası{/g} kullan.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g} surfaces, electricity, toxic fumes, and other hazardous environmental effects can deal damage to your party or inflict ongoing {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative effects{/g}.
Use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to stop such effects.
